answers.answer: Hi Patotas,I am glad you are ok.Your reaction of being pale and shaking is an adrenaline reaction to the fear you experienced.  This is a very normal reaction to what happened.No, you cannot get diabetes from being scared / having a panic attack.

question: Hello, everyone  today has been a horrible day  and have never been through something like this it was terrified I was kidnapped and then released thank god ! I got very scared like never before I got extremely pale and couldn't stopped shaking I'm scared that what happened I would get diabetes is possible can you get diabetes from a panic attack or being scared to death??
title: Scared to death?!
